name: ail-leak
description: An information leak as defined by the AIL Analysis Information Leak framework.

first-seen.description: When the leak has been accessible or seen for the first time.

last-seen.description: When the leak has been accessible or seen for the last time.

type.description: Type of information leak as discovered and classified by an AIL module.

original-date.description: When the information available in the leak was created. It's usually before the first-seen.

text.description: A description of the leak which could include the potential victim(s) or description of the leak.

origin.description: The link where the leak is (or was) accessible at first-seen.

sensor.description: The AIL sensor uuid where the leak was processed and analysed.
